title: Right to return policy
context: [ยง431:10H-214] Disclosure; limitations. If a long-term care insurance policy or certificate contains any limitations with respect to preexisting conditions, the limitations shall appear as a separate paragraph of the policy or certificate and shall be labeled as &ldquo;Preexisting Condition Limitations&rdquo;. [L 1999, c 93, pt of ยง2]
